sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>beans</radical> radical and the <kanji>beans</kanji> kanji are exactly the same!
readingMnemonic: These <kanji>beans</kanji> are from <ja><reading>とう</reading>きょう</ja>. Everybody knows <ja>とうきょう</ja> has the best beans. What?! You didn’t know that? Tokyo’s beans are the best beans!
readingInfo: Imagine eating these beans from <ja>とうきょう</ja>. They’re the best beans you’ve ever had. Even if you don’t like beans, you love <ja>とうきょう</ja> beans. Mmm… beans, beans, <ja>とうきょう</ja> beans.
